channel.title: Wizard Artificer, Archivist and Dragonmarks
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wizard Artificer, Archivist and Dragonmarks"

item.title: Re: Wizard Artificer, Archivist and Dragonmarks
item.content:encoded: Removed Greater Dragonmark from the main page (partially posted here so I could find it later if needed.

item.title: Re: Wizard Artificer, Archivist and Dragonmarks
item.content:encoded:
Ah yeah, thats homebrew, it shouldnt be in there

Maybe we might wanna make a Homebrew Feats section, but there arent a lot of feats made by the kinds of people this website allows homebrew from, so odds are it would only have one or two things, which isnt really enough to warrent its own section yet

item.title: Re: Wizard Artificer, Archivist and Dragonmarks
item.content:encoded:
Added the two subclasses and the UA feat to the Archived UA section on the main page.

I also see a Greater Dragonmark feat under the UA section, but it looks to be from Wayfinder's Guide to Eberron which I think we've previously classified as homebrew since it's not officially published content.

item.title: Wizard Artificer, Archivist and Dragonmarks
item.content:encoded:
Just making a thread to say Ive added the wizard-artificer subclass and the artificer-archivist subclass to their respective archived UA sections in their class pages, aswell as a page for the original dragonmark feat, which can be found here: http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:dragonmark-ua

Recommendation: We should have a sticky page to list any new pages that we have added that need to be linked on the frontpage, such as feats and so, as it would probably be more efficient than starting a new thread each time we need to add a feat. Perhaps people could just generally list subpages added, such as subclasses, so people can keep track with them too.
